title: Guides: Student's Guide to Clinical Information Sources: Drugs/Toxicology/Herbal Preparations

description: Guides: Student's Guide to Clinical Information Sources: Drugs/Toxicology/Herbal Preparations
cleaned_text: to help master the key concepts of pharmacology. It covers all major drug classes and include: mechanism of action, key pharmacokinetics, major therapeutic uses, and common and serious adverse effects. It incorporates relevant physiology,
